Text: #G10# As a site member, I want to search for profiles based on a few fields, so that I can find others I might want to connect with.
Action: Search For Profiles On A Few Fields

Text: #G10# As a site member, I want to mark my email address as private even if the rest of my profile is not, so that no one can contact me.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to access old news that is no longer on the home page, so that I can access things I remember from the past or that others mention to me.
Action: Access Old News Longer Is No On The Home Page

Text: #G10# As a site member, I want to subscribe to an RSS feed of news, so that I remain sufficiently and easily informed.
Action: Subscribe To An Rss Feed Of News

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to see a list of all upcoming Certification Courses and can page through them if there are a lot, so that I can choose the best course for me.
Action: See A List Of All Upcoming Certification Courses

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to see a list of all upcoming Events, so that I can decide if I want to attend any.
Action: See A List Of All Upcoming Events

Text: #G10# As a site administrator, I want to create an Other Course or Event that is not charged a listing fee, so that the Scrum Alliance doesn't charge itself for Scrum Gatherings that it puts on.
Action: Create An Other Course Not Charged A Listing Fee

Text: #G10# As a trainer, I want to update one of my existing courses or events, so that it reflects accurate information.
#G10# As a site admin, I want to delete any course or event, so that I can remove things that will no longer occur.
#G10# As a trainer, I want to turn a course into an event or an event into a course, so that I can correctly classify anything that was entered incorrectly.
Action: Turn A Course Into An Event

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to have an advanced search option that lets me fill in a form of search criteria, so that I can quickly find what I am looking for.
Action: Have An Advanced Search Option Lets Fill A Form Of Search Criteria

Text: #G10# As a site member, I want to download the latest training material and methodology PDFs, so that I have them.
Action: Methodology The Latest Training Material Pdfs

Text: #G10# As a visitor, I want to download presentations, PDFs, etc. on Scrum, so that I can learn from them or use them.
#G10# As a site member, I want to subscribe to an RSS feed of jobs available, so that I can read them without visiting the site.
Action: Subscribe To An Rss Feed Of Jobs

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to read a new article on the front page about once a week, so that I am up on all the latest happenings.
Action: Read A New Article On The Front Page A Week Once

Text: #G10# As the site editor, I want to have pretty good control over how the article, so that articles are visually appealing.
Action: Have Pretty Good Control Over How The Article

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to click the link from the article teaser to take me directly to the body of the article. not to another teaser setup, so that I can easily finish the article.
Action: Click The Link From The Article Teaser
The Link Take To The Body Of The Article

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to do a full-text search of article body, title, and author name, so that I can find what I want.
Action: Do A Full Search Of Title
Do A Full Search Of Author Name
Do A Full Text Search Of Article Body

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to subscribe to an RSS feed of articles, so that I can read them without visiting the site.
Action: Subscribe To An Rss Feed Of Articles

Text: #G10# As a site editor, I want to have a prominent area on the home page where I can put special announcements not necessarily news or articles, so that I can give them additional exposure.
Action: Have A Prominent Area On The Home Page Not

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to see new content when I come to the site, so that I come back more often.
#G10# As a site admin, I want to see the results for each trainer and averages for the class, so that I can identify any outliers or possible problems.
Action: See The Results For Each Trainer For The Class

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to view a section of the website that teaches me the basics of what Scrum is, so that I can learn that quickly.
Action: View A Section Of The Website Teaches Me The Basics What Scrum Is

Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to view lists on the site of all Certified Scrum Masters, Practitioners, Trainers, and Certified Scrum Product Owners.
Action: View Lists On The Site Of Certified Product Scrum Owner
View Lists On The Site Of Practitioner
View Lists On The Site Of Trainer
View Lists On The Site Of All Certified Scrum Masters

Text: #G10# As a site admin, I want to move people in a trainer's class from a pending state to the registry once I have received proof of payment from the trainer.
Action: Move People In A Trainer's Class From A Pending State To The Registry
Received Proof Of Payment From The Trainer

Text: #G10# As a site editor, I want to edit the content of the email automatically sent to new Certified Scrum Masters and Product Owners, so that I don't need to involve a programmer on simple email edits.
Action: Edit The Content Of The Automatically Email To Product Owner
Edit The Content Of The Automatically Email To Certified, New Scrum Masters

Text: #G10# As a corporatesponsor, I want to display my logo on a corporate sponsors page, so that others see the company's support of Scrum.
Action: Display Logo On A Corporate Sponsors Page

Text: #G10# As a CSM, I want to be charged a fee once I am approved for Practitioner status, so that my certification status can be activated.
#G10# As a site editor, I want to post information in a trainers-only section, so that only trainers see it.
Action: Post Information In A Only Trainers Section

Text: #G11# As a developer, I want to have the subdomain beta.nsf.gov be set up, so that I can deploy a beta site to it.
#G11# As a stakeholder, I want to see the results of user research, so that I can determine if the CMS is right for me.
Action: See The Results Of User Research

Text: #G11# As a team member, I want to have a prioritized list of features and elements of a future social element page, so that I can work with the engineers to determine feasibility.
Action: Have A Prioritized List Of Element
Have A Prioritized List Of Features Of A Social, Future Element Page

Text: #G11# As a team member, I want to determine a design direction for the beta social page, so that we can implement a beta site quickly without established brand guidelines.
Action: Determine A Design Direction For The Social, Beta Page

Text: #G11# As a content editor, I want to be able to easily find content, so that I can edit it.
#G11# As a user, I want to add a video to my article.
#G11# As an NSF employee, I want to have an updated roadmap document, so that I can see prioritized areas to focus on for the next few months and beyond.
#G11# As a researcher, I want to develop the user research protocol for internal workflows, so that we can begin testing against a CMS prototype.
Action: Develop The User Research Protocol For Internal Workflows

Text: #G11# As an NSF employee, I want to have high-level strategy recommendations to implement in conjunction with the new CMS.
Action: Implement In Conjunction With The New Cms

Text: #G11# As a content designer, I want to demonstrate the value of user-centered content design to ensure it's an integral part of our recommendations.
Action: Demonstrate The Value Of User, Centered Content Design 'S An Integral Part Of Recommendations

Text: #G11# As a team member, I want to know when the mid-point checkin is and what will be covered, so that I can plan accordingly.
#G11# As a web recruiter manager, I want to confirm the recruiter is set up and working properly, so that I can deploy it on more pages.
#G11# As a VisualDesigner, I want to create a moodboard to aid with visual design concepts for the nsf.gov website, so that we can discuss different design concepts with stakeholders.
Action: Aid With Visual Design Concepts For The Nsf.Gov Website

Text: #G11# As a user researcher, I want to make sure the correct NSF people are invited to user interviews, so that they can observe the interviews and make recommendations accordingly.
#G11# As a user researcher, I want to begin drafting a research plan, so that I can begin recruiting participants.
#G11# As a content editor, I want to be able to add videos from Brightcove.
#G11# As a team member, I want to know what visual design related tasks we might need to plan for this sprint, so that I can assign tasks as necessary.
#G11# As an NSF employee, I want to see how the user recruitment form looks and behaves on a sample page, so that I can understand the impact the recruitment will have on the NSF page.
Action: Behaves The User Recruitment Form On A Sample Page

Text: #G11# As a site administrator, I want to understand how other similar organizations are handling visual design, so that I can make informed decisions about what appears to work well and what doesn't.
#G11# As an NSF employee, I want to know where the initial in-person meeting will be, so that I can plan on attending.
#G11# As a team member, I want to know when meetings are, so that I can plan accordingly.
#G11# As a team member, I want to understand how work moves between UX/content > visual design > front end dev for a sprint cycle.
Action: Visual Understand How Work Moves Between Ux Front, > End Dev For A Sprint Cycle

Text: #G13# As a moderator, I want to see all items we try to estimate this session, so that I can answer questions about the current story such as "does this include ___".
#G13# As a moderator, I want to add an item to the list of items to be estimated, so that so that we can be flexible and accommodate situations where we think of a new story while playing.
Action: Add An Item To The List Of Items To Estimated

Text: #G13# As a moderator, I want to delete an item from the list of items to be estimated, so that we can remove it and not estimate it.
Action: Delete An Item From The List Of Items To Estimated

Text: #G13# As a moderator, I want to enter the agreed-upon estimate, so that we can move on to the next item when we agree.
#G13# As a moderator, I want to import stories from a spreadsheet, so that I don't have to copy and paste each individual story.
#G13# As a moderator, I want to copy/paste stories from a spreadsheet, so that I can get started more quickly.
#G13# As a moderator, I want to export a transcript of a game as a CSV file, so that I can further process the stories and estimates.
Action: Export A Transcript Of A Game As A Csv File

Text: #G13# As a moderator, I want to delete my account, so that account information and games are no longer stored.
#G13# As a moderator, I want to invite up to 15 estimators, so that we can play with large but not immense teams.
#G13# As a participant, I want to immediately see that an estimate has been given by a specific estimator, so that I know who has already given an estimate and who we're still waiting for.
#G13# As a participant, I want to be able to change my estimate up until the last person selects a card and all are shown, so that I can change my mind based on information I hear.

#G13# As a participant, I want to be able start a two-minute countdown timer that all participants can see, so that I can limit the time spent discussing the estimates when I think we've talked long enough.
Action: Start A Minute Countdown Timer That All Participants See

Text: #G13# As a developer, I want to have a list of definitions for commonly used terms, so that everyone working on the project can understand each other more easily.
Action: Have A List Of Definitions For Commonly Used Terms

Text: #G13# As a user, I want to be able to use Unicode, so that I can use any language I like.
#G13# As a user, I want to see sensible and predictable URLs, so that the application feels logical and transparent.
#G13# As a Mike, I want to be able to see some metrics on use of the game, so that I can see how much it is being used.
Action: See Some Metrics On Use Of The Game
